testCaseName: Verify if an user can SignUp if the checkbox of [Terms of Service] is unchecked.
name: Verify if an user can SignUp if the checkbox of [Terms of Service] is unchecked.
description: This test case is to verify it the user can SignUp after filling all the fields and uncheck the [Terms of Service] checkbox.
